Name: OXO Good Grips 8-Inch Chef's Knife
contro:
Handle does not feel as secure as on some other knives
  • Back of blade is very thin which makes it uncomfortable to press down for tasks like mincing
  • Poor at slicing and chopping onions, slicing steak, and mincing parsley
  • Blade lost its sharpness relatively quickly after extended use in GHRI tests
pro:
Rubberized handle
  • Very good at cutting basil into thin ribbons, slicing carrots, and cutting up a whole chicken
